EmailTemplate.name: Business Partnership Opportunity (1559745428.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Business Partnership Opportunity (1559745428.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Carrie,
It was great meeting yourself and Joseph yesterday.
If you can get us some usage information prior to our next meeting that'd be great. It'd be useful to know what you are spending on office related supplies on a monthly basis, and if you can get Bryant to offer the same for PPE & Facilities supplies.
We will be back in the area the week of June 17th, so if you are available that week we can work around your chosen date & time.
To get an idea of the kinds of products and services we provide (pay no mind to pricing) please take a look at the link to our website below.
https://www.grandandtoy.com/ <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/]]>
Let me know if you have any questions and what dates work best for the meeting.
Best regards,
Liz Rust Business Development Manager, Central Canada 200 Aviva Park Dr, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 365-778-8250 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]> business.grandandtoy.com <[[http://business.grandandtoy.com/]]>
